content: Daivamaaya kartthaave! Pakal samayatthe addhvaananga llil ninnu nyangallude shareeram viramikkukayum, laukikachintakallilninnu nyangallude manassu pinvaangukayum cheythukondu ee sandhyaasamayatthu shaantamaayi thirusannidhiyil nilako nd. Nithyasthuthikallum thudarchayaaya sthothrangallum ninakkarppi kkuvaanum nyangallude jeevane samrakshichu nayikkunnavanum nyangallude aathmaakkallude sahaayiyum rakshithaavumaaya ninte krpaykku sthuthi paaduvaanum nyangalle yogyaraakkaname. Nyangall ninakku sthuthiyum sothravum karettunnu. Hosho...

Vaazhtthunnu vaanavar vaanil
Kuppunnu maanavar mannil
Srashdaavekan daivatthe
Nithyananaadyantan thanne.

Naathhanodunnatha naadatthil praarththhichu nyaan
Sthuthinaadatthaal modippikkunnen-nyaan ninne
En paapangalleyortthippoll sangkadapoorvvam
Yaachikkunnen-enne thallllikkallayaruthe
Aparaadhatthin-bahulathayaalazhalum vyathhayum
Nyaanarppikkunnu-mshihaa! Raajaave!
Thonneedaname-karallalivenmel.

Anpudayonaamudayone! Anpaa-lente kadam
Veettaname pizhapokkaname-shathrujanatthin
Valayil chaadi-parichitharude parihaasatthinu
Paathramathaavaan-eeyulllloneppakayanu nee
Vittukodukkaruthe mashihaa naathhaa!
Vaathilil muttunnen-krpacheyyenam.

Svargapuratthinneerenaam doothan-preshithanaayu
Nasrayapuriyil daaveedin-suthavaazhvezhuvoll
Thansavidhatthil-shaantipradamaam sandesham
Chonnaanevam-naathhan ninnil prathhama suthan
Ninniludicheedum-mshihaa! Avalliludi-
Choru deveshaa!-krpa cheyyenam.

Svargaadrshya-pronnathagehatthil-nivasikkum
Vahnimayaathmamayanmaar than-vadanangallumee
Bhoojaathikallum-vaazhttolletthanmozhi pol
Shlaaghicheedum-thanperunnaallaaghoshichor
Kkellaam sarvveshaa! Thal praarththhanayaal
Paapavimochanama-ngekeedename.

Naathhanuvendi yaathanayettore!-nirmmalayaam
Sabhayude thoonukallaayore!-vishvaasatthin
Varashilpikalle!-nibishleehaa sahadenmaare!
Shlomosvayame-daavi dinmozhi polavane-
Ppinchennor ningall-msheehaa! Deveshaa!
Thalpraarththhanayaal-krpa cheyyaname.

Poornnamanassaal-mashihaaye snehi-chehikamaam
Nashvarabahumaanatthe vedi-nyaathmaarththhathayaal
Daivikamaakum-bhakthiyeyishdappettoraam
Sahadenmaar than-apadaanangalle varnnippaan
Vaibhavamaarkkundaam-mshihaa! Deveshaa!
Thal praarththhanayaal-krpathonnaname.

Krpathannarayil nyangalleyettaname-choranpol
Chungkakkaaran paapiniye-nnivarpol thaapam
Kaikollllaname-thalllliya sheemonennonam.
Pokkuka paapam-karunaanidhiyaam kartthaave!
Pashchaatthaapayutham-ninne praapichidu
Manuthaapikallil-priyamullllon nee.

Ninuvayar vempi-nibiyaam yaunaanthan-naadatthaal
Jaagaranam nompanuthaapam-praarththhanayivayil
Sharanappettor-thinmaye vittor nanmakkaayu
Thookiya kanneer-yaunaan nibichonnavidhittheer-
Ppellaam maayichu-dhanyan pashchaatthaapa-
Mavarkkekiya-karunaasindhu.

Kartthaave! Nin-paripaavana thanuvum-rakthamathum
Kaikkondu mrthanmaarkkellaam-nalkeedaname
Mahithasmarana-doothasametham saaghosham
Neeyetthumpoll-ninte valatthaayu nilakondi-
Ttavar mukhakaantiyezhum-mshihaa! Deveshaa!
Vaazhtthaname nin daivathvatthe.

Saadarametthum nin bhavane-en nercha ninakku kazhiykkum nyaan haaleluyyaa
Anpum mukthiyuma-ngantiyilarththhippaan
Naathhaa! Vannu nyangallithaa nin bhavanatthil
Ninneppulariyilum-pranamikkum nyangall
Paapikalleppaapatthinnum-rakshippon nee.

Sthuthi unarvvallllone!-eerayasevithane!
Nee maanavashushrooshakallil-priyamullllonaam
Aazhattheennadiyaar-ninne villikkunnu
Yonaykkennathupol nyangall-kkuttharamarullka.

Purushaneyariyaathe-paramapavithrathayil
Daivatthinu maathaavaayoru-dhanyacharithre!
Ee nin perunnaallil-mrtharaashvaasamathum
Jeevitharaashayumaarjippaan-praarththhikkaname.

Mashihaaye mariyaam-muttinmelenti
Sthanyam vimalam sakalajagath-poshakaneki
Daivatthodu narane-yojippichone
Vachu keeratthuni chutti-paazhpulkkoottil

Maanavaraashikkaay-jeevaneyentunna
Vyaapaarikallaam parishuddha-nmaare! Shlomo
Arththhijanangallkkaay-praarththhanayaam nidhithan
Vaathil thurannozhivaakkaname-baadhakallellaam.

Prallayatthin naallil-neethiparan noha
Pettakamathilajeevikalle-paalichathupol
He! Sahadenmaare!-maanavalokatthe
Choozhum thiramaalakalleennum-rakshikkaname:

Maartthommaa! Vaanor-nin prabha kandanchi
Maanavar nin mahitham naamam-keertthikkunnu.
Salkriya kandudayon-ninsmrthi valuthaakki
Nyangallodoppam nin praarththhanayundaakatte.

Nirmmalaril kaniyum-nirmmalanaam devaa!
Nyangallkkennum nalkaname-nirmmala hrdayam
Nin preethikkethiraam-paazhaam chintakallum
Dushdavikaaravumengallil ni-nnozhivaakkaname,

Ninuvayilennonam-nyangallilaliyaname
Vimukhatha paapikallaamivaril-kaatteedaruthe,
Anpudayone! Nin-vaathiladachennaal
Muttivillippaanillayyo mattoruvaathil.

Rakshaka thirumeyyum-rakthavumullkkonda
Mrthigathajanathaykkarullaname-modavumuyirum
Nin varavil vidhiyil-nin krpa kandetthi
Nin daivikamaam valabhaaga-tthavar nilkkaname.

En praarththhana naathhaa! Kellkkaname-haale…
Ente vilaapam pookaname nin sannidhiyil
Pukapolen naallukallillaathaay-haale…
Ennasthhikall venmayaninyu venneerpole

Nyangalle nal nilamaakkaname-naathhaa! Nin krpayaal
Thiruvachanatthin vitthukallaa-thmaavil vallaraname.

Bahumohanamathikamaneeyam
Maayunnu pakalin deepthi-
Nin krpaniravetteedaname
Nyangallkkaayi keniveykkum
Dushdaneyaattippaayikka
Nyangallkkanisham nin sleebaa
Jaagrathayerum rakshayathaakatte.

Vaanileyeere doothanmaar
maanavanaadam kellkkunnu
cholleedunnundavarevam
aathmaavin nantuniyaale
sthothram paadunnaadaamyar naadam paartthaal
Modakaram paaram

Eeshaa! Naathhaa! Varika thunappaan villikoottunnu
Praarththhana kettittaathmaakkallmel krpa cheyyenam.

Ninvalamaakum kaiyaal naathhaa nyaanuyirelkka-
Ttaadhanavaanpol nyaan narakatthil vyathhayelkkalle
Theekkadal thaandaan neerin padavil nyaaneratte
Ghorajvaalavishamathayenne baadhikkalle.

Neerabraahatthodarththhikkaanidayaamkalle
Chodichennaal kittukayillennariyaamaarkkum
Thinmakallaale theeyil veenaal kaananame nyaan
Haananiyaadyanmaar pol ninne naalaamaallaay.

Raajyatthinum narakatthinum naathhan mashihaa.......
Nyangalleyanpaal narakattheennum rakshikkenam.

Nyangallude kartthaavaaya yeshumishihaa! / Ninte karunayude vaathil nyangallude nere nee adaykkaruthe / kartthaave! Nyangall paapikallaakunnu /  ennu nyangall ettu parayunnu / nyangallodu karunayundaakaname.
Kartthaave! Ninte maranatthaal / nyangallude maranam maayikkappeduvaanaayittu / ninte sneham ninte sthhaanatthuninnu nyangallude adukkalekku ninne irakkikkondu vannu / nyangallodu karunayundaakaname.
